aboutMe.title: Software developer, biker, amateur photographer
aboutMe.description:
I'm Gino, a software developer and IT administrator from Berlin. All-inclusive vacations are too boring for me and I love to go on spontaneous road trips. 
Fast motorcycles with a good sound excite me.
